BLRoyApp58.Transcription:
O my lady dureO my lady dureI am your prisonero
                    my lady dureI am your prisoner
BLRoyApp58.Note:
‘Iohn Ambrose’ is written at the end of the first stave in
                    the hand of the scribe.
BLRoyApp58.Editions:
Flügel,  Ewald. 
             “Liedersammlungen des XVI Jahrhunderts, Besonders aus der Zeit Heinrichs
                VIII.” 
             Anglia
         12 (1889): 225-72, 585-97: 265.
